title: Lakeside 2 Bedroom Apartment Near Rainbow Beach
posting_body: O'Toole Tower Apartments  -  7701 S. South Shore Drive
This elevator Apartment Building is in a great location by Lake Michigan's Rainbow Beach and Park.
You can enjoy lake views and South Shore's Park Recreation facility.
Units are newly decorated and include a Stove, Refrigerator, Air-Conditioner, Carpeting, Ceiling Fans and Blinds.
Both heat and cooking gas are FREE -- electric is not included.
Gated Off Street Parking for an additional charge per month (assigned spots and gated lot).
One bedroom -- $350 non-refundable move-in fee after application is approved.
Two bedroom -- $500 non-refundable move-in fee after application approval.
$40 non-refundable application fee for credit and background check.
Please call KALABICH MANAGEMENT at (708) 424-4216 for availability and to set up an appointment.
Rental office hours are Monday through Friday 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m and Saturdays from 8:00 a.m. until 12:00 noon by appointment.
You can also check us out on Facebook, our website kalabichmgmt.com, or Twitter (@KalabichMgmt).
